snippet: By slipping on a headset, recruits can see what it is like to be in the team huddle, listen to a coach’s speech, run down the tunnel before a game or tour the campus.
abstract: Virtual reality is popular training tool among college football programs, and handful of teams are now using technology for recruiting purposes; working with software companies, schools are designing virtual reality environments that mirror a campus visit experience.
lead_paragraph: By slipping on a headset, recruits can see what it is like to be in the team huddle, listen to a coach’s speech, run down the tunnel before a game or tour the campus.

headline.main: New Use of Virtual Reality Adds Another Dimension to Coaches’ Recruiting Tactics
headline.print_headline: New Use of Virtual Reality Adds Another Dimension to Coaches’ Recruiting Tactics
